alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 19 at 12:52AM AKDT until October 21 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM FRIDAY TO 10 PM AKDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Visibility one half mile or less. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. Winds gusting to around 50 mph. * WHERE...Central Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From 10 AM Friday to 10 PM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Strong winds and blowing snow will decrease to visibility to half mile or less. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are expected to increase substantially from the west Friday morning. Strongest winds are expected Friday night and Saturday when winds could gust as high as 50 mph. Winds and snow will begin to decrease Saturday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
